channel.title: No errors but it dont work?

item.title: No errors but it dont work?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright i tried adding a timer and a hit limit to this because it was hitting a 99 sometimes. How can i do that being this did nothing for a timer or hit rate…
please if u know something about it… help

case 744:
	if (playerRights >= 0) {
		setAnimation(2840);
		txt4 = "Eat My Shorts!";
                hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(50);
                PkingDelay = 15;
sendMessage("The heart Disolves");
                string4UpdateRequired = true;
		stillgfx(444, absY, absX);
		attackPlayersWithin(444, 99, 5);
		deleteItem(744,getItemSlot(744), 1);
        inCombat();
        }

Read full topic
item.source: No errors but it dont work?
